source: He who pays the piper calls the tune
definitions: The person who provides the money for something has the right to make decisions about how it is done.
The person or organization that funds an endeavor has the ultimate control over its direction and outcomes.
examples: We might not like their new policies, but they're the main investors, so he who pays the piper calls the tune.
The government is funding the research, so they get to decide the priorities; he who pays the piper calls the tune.
lemma: He who pays the piper calls the tune
synonyms: whoever holds the purse strings rules
